import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './BookList.css' const Book = (book) => { const trunc = (num) => { return num.toFixed(2) } return (

{book.title}

by {book.author}

trunc({book.ratings_average}) average rating

) } export default Book {/* {/*

{book.title}

{book.author}

*/}
